description:
Nono`s despair grows as her certainty that she`ll get a Buster Machine fades. She`s sent to Pluto to recover an old Buster Machine, but there`s more going on than a salvage operation... and to Nono`s heart!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il risveglio della leggendaria Buster Machine!
復活!! 伝説のバスターマシン!
